name: Just Another Breakout Clone
description:
Just Another Breakout Clone

The classic Breakout style game is good for casual fun and killing time. The aim of the game is to destroy your targets and make sure the ball stays inside of the play zone. You control the paddle at the bottom of the screen and the blocks in the upper game area are your targets.

Be quick and think fast! See if you can complete all 15 rounds!

Points

Each block hit gives points based on it's color. Different color blocks also require multiple hits to destroy.

  • White Blocks - 10 points
  • Yellow Blocks - 20 points
  • Green Blocks - 30 points
  • Blue Blocks - 40 points
  • Red Block - 50 points

In addition to the normal points, when hitting the final block in a round you will get the normal amount of points plus an additional 100 points for each life you have left - per hit!!!

You start the game with 10 lives. Upon completion of each round you will gain an extra life.

Game Controls
  • Move paddle Left: Left Arrow or A
  • Move paddle Right: Right Arrow or D
  • Launch ball into play: Left Ctrl or Left Mouse Button
  • Quit Game: Esc (Windows standalone build only)
Thanks for playing my very first game! I hope you enjoy it. Feel free to leave a comment below and let me know what you think!
